name: Rebel Star
summary: Pan Xing AKA Rebel is a hexagonal strategy game similar to Military Madness featuring futuristic battle mechs. This game was completed and slated to be released but when Funtech stopped production of the Super A'Can, all sales were halted as well leaving only a few sample copies of the game in existence.
